mapper.select: SELECT TR_NUM, TR_ID, TR_TITLE, TR_CNT, TR_LIKE, TR_CONTENT, TR_REGDATE, R FROM (SELECT TR_NUM, TR_ID, TR_TITLE, TR_CNT, TR_LIKE, TR_CONTENT, TR_REGDATE, ROWNUM R FROM (SELECT TR_NUM, TR_ID, TR_TITLE, TR_CNT, TR_LIKE, TR_CONTENT, TR_REGDATE FROM TRIP WHERE TR_SHARE = 'Y' ORDER BY TR_LIKE DESC) ) WHERE R BETWEEN 1 AND 3
